And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Does Not <S%G3756><s%> Make Ashamed, <S%G2617><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Been Poured Out <S%G1632><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Our <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Hearts <S%G2257><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Us : <S%G2254><s%>

Still <S%G2089><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> Without Strength <S%G772><s%> In Due <S%G2596><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> For The <S%G5228><s%> Ungodly <S%G765><s%> Died. <S%G599><s%>

Hardly <S%G3433><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> A Just Man <S%G1342><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> Will Die; <S%G599><s%> On Behalf <S%G5228><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Good Man <S%G18><s%> Perhaps <S%G5029><s%> Some One <S%G5100><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Might Dare <S%G5111><s%> To Die; <S%G599><s%>

<S%G4921><s%> But Commends <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G1438><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Still <S%G2089><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Died. <S%G599><s%>
